entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Ignore Other Global Query Filters during OnModelCreating #34986
  • Preprocessing normalization does not visit recursively for normalized Any/All #34984
    10.0.0
  • Attempts of returning DbSet.Local entities instead of requesting a database if possible. #34983
  • Cosmos: review cast/convert handling #34982
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.EntityFrameworkCore.Sqlite.NetTopologySuite ERROR: System.ArgumentException: shell is empty but holes are not #34981
  • Issue Running EF Core Migration Bundle in .NET SDK Container Image on Linux Debian (WSL2) #34979
  • EF Core - SQLClient includes all columns from a joined table in the SQL query, even when only one field is explicitly selected #34980
  • ToListAsync returns wrong amount of rows when using TemporalAll and list projection #34978

Closed

  • When is "order by" generated in the underlying sql command text #34971
  • Not using updated ConnectionString #34961
  • Query: unexpected data for queries using (number + fixed_length_string) due to type inference #31917
    10.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Recursively visit when normalizing Any/All to Contains #34985

Merged

  • [TINY/CLEANUP] enabling test for scenario that was fixed earlier #34975

Updated

  • Update .Sources package reference #34973
  • Return the default schema for owned entity types when not mapped to the same table as the owner. #34974
